pages.text: Accessing new spells will require a small amount of setup, resources, and base building. New spells can be learned by obtaining items called Glyphs. Glyphs are created by the Glyph Press using magical clay, a reagent, and World Mana. Once you have obtained a glyph, simply use it with a spellbook in your inventory in order to write the glyph to the book.
To learn about creating new glyphs, see the section on the Glyph Press.
